dcterms:description: IMAGENET-C is a benchmark dataset designed to evaluate the robustness of image classifiers against common visual corruptions. It consists of 15 types of algorithmically generated corruptions, each with five levels of severity, applied to the ImageNet validation images.
dcterms:title: IMAGENET-C

dcterms:description: ICONS-50 is a dataset consisting of 10,000 images belonging to 50 classes of icons, designed to evaluate robustness to surface variations such as style and subtype variations. Each class contains icons from different sources, showcasing various artistic styles.
dcterms:title: ICONS-50
